select.if: SELECT sl.id AS slip_id, sl.type type, sl.state state , sl.department_id, sl.department_request , sal.sum_pay sum_total, sal.income_tax sum_tax , em.id employee_id, em.name employee_name, em.photo employee_photo , em.email employee_email, em.hire_date FROM SLIP sl JOIN REQUEST re ON sl.department_request = re.id JOIN SALARY_REQUEST_VIEW sal ON re.id = sal.id JOIN EMPLOYEE em ON em.id = sal.employee_id WHERE sl.id=#{slip_id}
